remarks: Ordering relation for a strictly monotonic sequence, increasing case. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
monoords.fk $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
monoords.flt $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ..^ N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) < ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) $.
monoords.i $e |- ( ph -> I e. ( M ... N ) ) $.
monoords.j $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( M ... N ) ) $.
monoords.iltj $e |- ( ph -> I < J ) $.
monoords $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` I ) < ( F ` J ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d I k $.
$d J k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
